class_libraries.library:
<class name="NormalizeJointTrajectoryWithLimits" type="joint_normalization_filters::NormalizeJointTrajectory" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Wraps continuous joints between -M_PI to M_PI.
<class name="NormalizeFilterJointTrajectoryRequest" type="joint_normalization_filters::NormalizeJointTrajectory" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Wraps continuous joints between -M_PI to M_PI.
<class name="NormalizeFilterJointTrajectoryWithConstraintsRequest" type="joint_normalization_filters::NormalizeJointTrajectory" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Wraps continuous joints between -M_PI to M_PI.
<class name="UnNormalizeJointTrajectoryWithLimits" type="joint_normalization_filters::UnNormalizeJointTrajectory" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Uses the current joint state information to unwrap continuous joints to the nearest position to the current joint state. This filter will incrementally update points in a trajectory. This filter listens for a message on the "/joint_states" topic for the current joint state.
<class name="UnNormalizeFilterJointTrajectoryRequest" type="joint_normalization_filters::UnNormalizeJointTrajectory" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Uses the current joint state information to unwrap continuous joints to the nearest position to the current joint state. This filter will incrementally update points in a trajectory. This filter listens for a message on the "/joint_states" topic for the current joint state.
<class name="UnNormalizeFilterJointTrajectoryWithConstraintsRequest" type="joint_normalization_filters::UnNormalizeJointTrajectory" base_class_type="filters::FilterBase">
Uses the current joint state information to unwrap continuous joints to the nearest position to the current joint state. This filter will incrementally update points in a trajectory. This filter listens for a message on the "/joint_states" topic for the current joint state.
